# bridges

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of bridges is to infer phylgenies from single-cells Copy Number data while being robust to mutational process such as BFB.

## Installation

You can install the development version of bridges from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jovoni/bridges")
```
